CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Golden Spoon}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Golden Spoon}.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Food Safety Index in 2018?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index in 2018 is {121.91} index.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Food Safety Index in 2016?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index in 2016 is {107.17} index.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Food Safety Index in 2015?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index in 2015 is {95.64} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Food Safety Index in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total food safety index is {95.64} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Food Safety Index in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total food safety index is {146.44} index.

SC.Q: What is the average height of The Golden Spoon's Food Safety Index area?
SC.A: The average height of The Golden Spoon's food safety index area is {119.62} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Food Safety Index go below 110 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {95.64} index in {2015}, total value was {107.17} index in {2016}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Food Safety Index fall between 113 and 125 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {121.91} index in {2018}, total value was {113.29} index in {2017}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Food Safety Index exceed 128 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {133.28} index in {2019}, total value was {146.44} index in {2020}.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Safety Index in 2015 higher or lower than in 2017?
NC.A: The total food safety index in {2015} was {lower} than in {2017}.

NC.Q: Between 2015 and 2019, was the average total Food Safety Index higher or lower than between 2017 and 2018?
NC.A: The average total food safety index between {2015} and {2019} was {lower} than between {2017} and {2018}.

NC.Q: Between 2015 and 2016, did the total Food Safety Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 2017 and 2020?
NC.A: The change in total food safety index between {2015} and {2016} was {smaller} than between {2017} and {2020}.

NC.Q: Between 2018 and 2019, was the average total Food Safety Index higher or lower than between 2015 and 2020?
NC.A: The average total food safety index between {2018} and {2019} was {higher} than between {2015} and {2020}.
